txt.en: You should tell Gerwyn that you defeated a number of Greenway bandits.\n\nGerwyn is in the circle of caravans, in northern Cardolan.
Gerwyn has asked you to defeat bandits who chased them out of Andrath.\n\nThe bandits are south of Andrath, in northern Cardolan.
Brigands along the road through Andrath are waylaying travellers.

'You return victorious! Most excellent! I know these roads are no longer travelled as they once were, but perhaps we have saved some lives today, and I am grateful we won't have to worry about having them at our backs.'

'Well met, fellow traveller. I see that you are also not from these lands. We came down the Greenway from Bree, and I should have known our luck had been too good for too long. We were attacked by brigands as we passed through Andrath, and in the hurry to get away from them, we had a waggon wheel crack. We circled up here for repairs, but I am worried the ruffians will follow us, or attack others on the road.\n\n'You seem capable and eager. There's coin in it for you, if you deal with them for us.'
